}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{On at76c50x matrix}}
Two USB IDs are included and active in the BWU613 driver.. *07b8:b000 (appears to be the used USB ID, per the [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/07b8/b000 USB ID repo]) *03eb:7605
[[Category:English Documentation]]
